snippet: The author Helen Fielding has begun writing a third novel starring her romantically challenged heroine, the BBC News Web site reported.
abstract: Helen Fielding, author of Bridget Jones book series, has begun writing third novel starring the character.
lead_paragraph: The author Helen Fielding has begun writing a third novel starring her romantically challenged heroine, the BBC News Web site reported.

headline.main: Bridget Jones, Older and Plugged In
